thread.title: Is Pierce Brosnan in 'Deadpool 2'? -- See Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman's Cryptic New Pic!
thread.title_full: Is Pierce Brosnan in 'Deadpool 2'? -- See Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman's Cryptic New Pic!

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Is Pierce Brosnan in 'Deadpool 2'? -- See Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman's Cryptic New Pic!
text: Is Pierce Brosnan in 'Deadpool 2'? -- See Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman's Cryptic New Pic! by Alex Ungerman 4:23   Instagram Ryan Reynolds may have just dropped some major Deadpool 2 casting news. The Deadpool star shared a cryptic photo to Instagram with Hugh Jackman and Pierce Brosnan, captioned, "Wolvie. Bond. Wade." A photo posted by Ryan Reynolds (@vancityreynolds) on Jan 17, 2017 at 2:03am PST â€” Hugh Jackman (@RealHughJackman) January 17, 2017 While it could just be an innocuous snap giving a shout-out to the three actors' respective big movie roles -- Jackman's "Wolverine," Brosnan's "James Bond," and Reynolds' "Deadpool" -- the pic has nonetheless got the rumor mill going that Brosnan may be joining the Marvel movie sequel. It's long been speculated that Wolverine may make an appearance in a future Deadpool film, though Jackman has never officially been announced as part of the project. WATCH: Ryan Reynolds Says Baby No. 2 Is a 'Mini Version' of Daughter James: 'The Circle of Life Is Real' However, with this new pic, the epic casting trifecta is looking all the more likely. We've got a while to mull it over, as Deadpool 2 isn't expected to hit theaters until 2018.
